subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The Vuelta a España began with an 8.1-mile team time trial Saturday night through the winding streets of Seville. The HTC-Columbia team won in 14 minutes 6 seconds.
snippet: The Vuelta a España began with an 8.1-mile team time trial Saturday night through the winding streets of Seville. The HTC-Columbia team won in 14 minutes 6 seconds.
